title: Pensioner killed in hit-and-run and carried for a mile in Kent 'deserved better end' say family
description: The 89-year-old Tom Wallace appears to have been carried on top of the car for about a mile after being hit in Kent. Two men have been tracked down and charged.
content:
Two men have been charged after an 89-year-old pedestrian died when he was hit by a car and apparently carried on top of it for about a mile.
The man, who has been named as Tom Wallace, was struck on the A289 Gads Hill in Gillingham, Kent, just after... [1837 chars]

title: Liam Rosenior opens door to Chelsea job but must wait on BlueCo dealings
description: Liam Rosenior has opened the door to becoming Chelsea’s new head coach by admitting that there are no guarantees that he will remain at Strasbourg for the rest of the season
content:
Liam Rosenior has opened the door to becoming Chelsea’s head coach by admitting there are no guarantees he will remain at Strasbourg for the rest of the season.

title: Anthony Joshua’s driver charged with dangerous driving after fatal crash in Nigeria
description: British boxer was injured in collision that killed his personal trainer Latif Ayodele and strength coach Sina Ghami
content:
Nigerian police have charged Anthony Joshua’s driver with causing death by dangerous driving after a fatal crash that killed two people.

title: Woman felt 'dehumanised' after Musk's Grok AI used to digitally remove her clothes
description: The BBC has seen several examples of it undressing women and putting them in sexual situations without their consent.
content:
A woman has told the BBC she felt "dehumanised and reduced into a sexual stereotype" after Elon Musk's AI Grok was used to digitally remove her clothing.

title: Police race to Bolton A&E after man attacks patients in waiting room
description: A man in his 20s has been arrested
content:
A man in his 20s has been arrested
Emergency services raced to Bolton A&E on Friday afternoon (January 2) after a man unleashed brutal attacks on patients inside. Police attended the scene at the hospital shortly after 4.15pm.
